title: A1706  820-00923-A no webcam
message:
Hi, I have an A1706   820-00923-A , that the camera stopped working. How can I make sure that the problem is on the camera (LCD) or if it is on the board?

Can you help?

title: A1706  820-00923-A no webcam
message:
Test first if Ambient Light Sensor works.
Check if L4004 is good.
